definition: season/the last month of a season/fourth or youngest amongst brothers/classifier for seasonal crop yields
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

sentences.english: Ornamental grasses are also valuable for supplying foliage colors, and for adding seasonal interest to gardens and landscapes.
sentences.chinese: 觀賞草豐富了園林的葉色，增加了園林的季相。

sentences.english: Plant disposition forms were single, seasonal variation was not obvious and local character was lack.
sentences.chinese: 植物配置形式單一，季相變化不明顯，缺少地方特色。

definition: tree, esp. with recognizable trunk (as opposed to 灌木[guan4 mu4], bush or shrub)
four seasons, namely: spring 春, summer 夏, autumn 秋 and winter 冬
